title: Why You Always Lion
description:
Mina and ESPN's Courtney Cronin dissect the NFC North and take a look at how the Bears, Vikings, Packers, and Lions will fare in the upcoming season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
